text: Yesli by My zakhoteli, to vozvysili by yego posredstvom otkroveniya. No on prel'stilsya zemnymi [blagami] i podchinilsya svoim nizmennym zhelaniyam. I podoben on psu: yesli ty zamakhnesh'sya na nego, on ogryzayetsya; i yesli ostavish' yego v pokoye, tozhe ogryzayetsya. Skazannoye - pritcha o tekh, kotoryye otvergayut Nashi znameniya. Tak poveday zhe im [zaveshchannoye] inoskazatel'no, - byt' mozhet, oni prizadumayutsya
